issue.title: Alternate repo for bintray
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12027](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12027). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As bintray is EOL soon (<https://jfrog.com/blog/into-the-sunset-bintray-jcenter-gocenter-and-chartcenter/)> could you please let me know the alternative repository from which we can pull arrow dependency ? 

 

The installation procedure here https://arrow.apache.org/install/ points to bintray. It will be good for us to know more persistent repository to download dependencies for future installation.
